text:
@NYGovCuomo Admit that you, and your beta-male mayor of NYC, were wrong. You have a terrible record on Coronavirus, you put those suffering from the virus into nursing homes and de Blasio didn’t want people contact traced at mass protests! This is just a slice.

YOU ARE A DISGRACE! ADMIT IT!
